Description: Body sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with part of palmette in added white and added red; exterior, slip worn: painted decoration consisting of part of a female figure's arm in white outline with narrow brown bracelet; traces of black on her upper arm; at right, part of possible second female figure in white outline.
Curator's comments: Female figures are depicted in outline on Grand Style vases whilst men depicted with flesh-coloured skin.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0804) (phase 2)
